p: The fresh leaves of S. magnificum were collected in July 2017 from Ukehe town in Igbo Etiti Local Government of Enugu State, Nigeria. The leaves were identified and authenticated by Mr. Alfred Ozioko of International Centre for Ethnomedicine and Drug Development (InterCEDD) Nsukka, Enugu State, Nigeria where the voucher number Intercedd/837 was deposited for reference purposes. The leaves were dried under room temperature and pulverized to coarse powder using a milling machine.
